verses.verse: He that is wounded in the stones <S%H6481><s%> <S%H8803><s%> <S%H1795><s%>, or hath his privy member <S%H8212><s%> cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, shall not enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

A bastard <S%H4464><s%> shall not enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; even to his tenth <S%H6224><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> shall he not enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

An Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> or Moabite <S%H4125><s%> shall not enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; even to their tenth <S%H6224><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> shall they not enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>:

Because <S%H1697><s%> they met <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you not with bread <S%H3899><s%> and with water <S%H4325><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, when ye came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and because they hired <S%H7936><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against thee Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> of Pethor <S%H6604><s%> of Mesopotamia <S%H763><s%>, to curse <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8763><s%> thee.

Nevertheless the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> would <S%H14><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>; but the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the curse <S%H7045><s%> into a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> unto thee, because the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.
Thou shalt not seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their peace <S%H7965><s%> nor their prosperity <S%H2896><s%> all thy days <S%H3117><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Thou shalt not abhor <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8762><s%> an Edomite <S%H130><s%>; for he is thy brother <S%H251><s%>: thou shalt not abhor <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8762><s%> an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>; because thou wast a stranger <S%H1616><s%> in his land <S%H776><s%>.

The children <S%H1121><s%> that are begotten <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of them shall enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in their third <S%H7992><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%>.

When the host <S%H4264><s%> goeth forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, then keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8738><s%> thee from every wicked <S%H7451><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%>.

If there be among you any man <S%H376><s%>, that is not clean <S%H2889><s%> by reason of uncleanness that chanceth <S%H7137><s%> him by night <S%H3915><s%>, then shall he go <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%> out of the camp <S%H4264><s%>, he shall not come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>:

But it shall be, when evening <S%H6153><s%> cometh on <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, he shall wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself with water <S%H4325><s%>: and when the sun <S%H8121><s%> is down <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, he shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into <S%H8432><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> again.
Thou shalt have a place also <S%H3027><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, whither thou shalt go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>:

And thou shalt have a paddle <S%H3489><s%> upon thy weapon <S%H240><s%>; and it shall be, when thou wilt ease <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thyself abroad <S%H2351><s%>, thou shalt dig <S%H2658><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therewith, and shalt turn back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> that which cometh <S%H6627><s%> from thee:

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8693><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thy camp <S%H4264><s%>, to deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thee, and to give up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; therefore shall thy camp <S%H4264><s%> be holy <S%H6918><s%>: that he see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no unclean <S%H6172><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> in thee, and turn away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from thee <S%H310><s%>.
Thou shalt not deliver <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto his master <S%H113><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> which is escaped <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from his master <S%H113><s%> unto thee:

He shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee, even among <S%H7130><s%> you, in that place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> of thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, where it liketh him best <S%H2896><s%>: thou shalt not oppress <S%H3238><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him.
There shall be no whore <S%H6948><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, nor a sodomite <S%H6945><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Thou shalt not bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the hire <S%H868><s%> of a whore <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, or the price <S%H4242><s%> of a dog <S%H3611><s%>, into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> for any vow <S%H5088><s%>: for even both <S%H8147><s%> these are abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Thou shalt not lend upon usury <S%H5391><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to thy brother <S%H251><s%>; usury <S%H5392><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%>, usury <S%H5392><s%> of victuals <S%H400><s%>, usury <S%H5392><s%> of any thing <S%H1697><s%> that is lent upon usury <S%H5391><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

Unto a stranger <S%H5237><s%> thou mayest lend upon usury <S%H5391><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; but unto thy brother <S%H251><s%> thou shalt not lend upon usury <S%H5391><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: that the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee in all that thou settest <S%H4916><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> to in the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

When thou shalt vow <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, thou shalt not slack <S%H309><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to pay <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8763><s%> it: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8800><s%> require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it of thee; and it would be sin <S%H2399><s%> in thee.
But if thou shalt forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to vow <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, it shall be no sin <S%H2399><s%> in thee.

That which is gone out <S%H4161><s%> of thy lips <S%H8193><s%> thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and perform <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; even a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%>, according as thou hast vowed <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which thou hast promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

When thou comest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, then thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> grapes <S%H6025><s%> thy fill <S%H7648><s%> at thine own pleasure <S%H5315><s%>; but thou shalt not put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any in thy vessel <S%H3627><s%>.

When thou comest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the standing corn <S%H7054><s%> of thy neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, then thou mayest pluck <S%H6998><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the ears <S%H4425><s%> with thine hand <S%H3027><s%>; but thou shalt not move <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a sickle <S%H2770><s%> unto thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> standing corn <S%H7054><s%>.
